title: Prosecution questions former FTX insider on missing $8 billion
description: Software developer Adam Yedidia later resigned when he learned that Alameda Reseach was taking funds from FTX customers

title: Elon Musk strips news headlines from X, posing challenge for media outlets
description: The headline of this article will no longer appear in the tile that automatically appears when a link to the piece is shared on X, formerly Twitter.

title: Zoom made employees return to the office to feel your hybrid pain
description: Experiencing customers’ pain points first-hand is necessary for the company to build products for hybrid and in-office work, Zoom said at its conference Zoomtopia.

title: Apple considered buying Microsoft’s Bing to battle Google
description: Recently unsealed testimony offers a rare glimpse of the behind-the-scenes maneuvering in the search-engine sector, which is overwhelmingly dominated by Google.
